abstract: Bank of America on Thursday said it expects to eliminate about 7,500 jobs over the next two years after it completes its acquisition of Countrywide Financial, the largest U.S. mortgage lender.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America on Thursday said it expects to eliminate about 7,500 jobs over the next two years after it completes its acquisition of Countrywide Financial, the largest U.S. mortgage lender.

headline.main: Bank of America to Cut 7,500 Jobs After Countrywide Deal
